message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm happy to pay $95 for this product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of that, I am willing to consider a price of $105 for our premium product. This still allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while being more accommodating to your financial situation.
